page.title: 08WINFORD CHURCH
page.content: {17.7.'85.CHURCH VISIT. } There was going to be a funeral so the latest grave to be dug was today.{The organ {is 97 years old which means it was put {there in 1888.The church had a fire in {1790.}After the fire the other part was built in 1850.Most of the windows in the church are 30 years old.But one is 146 years old and was placed in position in 1839.The most valuable thing is the{chalice}which was made in 1654 and made of pure silver.There is also a{silver plate dated 1661.The oldest people married were in their 60s but they were both remarrying.The vicar conducts about ten weddings a year,so he has done about 60 weddings so far.The vicar's name is Roy Hickes,Roy has been there for 25 years.There are 119 steps and they are 196 years old.The tower is over 100 years old and we went up.
